column4: I was reding ont he ubuntu forums about the problems people were having with their laptosp overheating if they had a intel core due.  Does thios affect other processors, specifically the pentium m series?
My lappy pentium M run cooler under linux/Ubuntu.  BUt I did give up some battery life.. 10 minutes per charge that I attribute to additional fan speed
do you have to do anything in rehgards to setting trip point for the fan to kick in, or does the kernel handle all this its self, or do config files for acpi control this?
I just installed it, I didnt do anything special..  XP was constantly overheating the HP... not a problem since
